pullRequest.title: Polish the context and optimize the tag analyze
pullRequest.bodyText:
If this pull request closes/resolves/fixes an existing issue, replace the issue number. Closes #.
 Update the CHANGES log.


Polish context, including TracingContext, ContextCarrier, CorrelationContext, and ExtensionContext. With the complexity increasing, the codes seem like breaking, even the functions are good. I reorganized the codes and make it clear. cc @EvanLjp
The current generated searchable tags could be duplicated, I use a HashSet to remove those.

commit.message: Polish the context and optimize the tag analyze
Fix bug of new context codes.
